titles.title: A resolution to authorize testimony by employees of the Senate in THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF CALIFORNIA v. ROGER CALDERON.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 9/20/1993--Introduced. Authorizes Claudette Josephson and any other Senate employee from whom testimony may be necessary to testify in the People of the State of California v. Roger Calderon or related proceedings, except concerning matters for which a privilege should be asserted.
